confirmations.resetToDefault: Are you sure you want to reset configuration to default?

tooltips.disabled: Check if you don't need this entity in your system.
tooltips.statusField: Updates of this field are logged in stream.
tooltips.deleteWithoutConfirmation: If checked, the individual record is deleted without user confirmation. Deletion of multiple records is still  to be confirmed.
tooltips.modifiedExtendedRelations: Changes in these relations will cause the update of "Modified At" date and time.
tooltips.dragAndDrop: This option activates the hierarchy sort order. This means that no other sorting is possible in hierarchical navigation.
tooltips.unInheritedFields: Values for these fields will not be inherited from the parent item.
tooltips.unInheritedRelations: Relations with these entities will not be inherited from parent item.
tooltips.hasAssignedUser: Enable Assigned User for Access Management.
